field.name: link_fivehundredpx
field.label: Link URL
field.description: Link URL for 500px service. Leave empty to disable

field.name: order_fivehundredpx
field.label: Position
field.description: Sort position of 500px icon within the display. Enter a numeric value.

field.name: pos_fivehundredpx
field.label: Location
field.description: Module area location for 500px icon.

field.name: columns
field.label: Columns
field.description: Number of columns to show.

field.name: rows
field.label: Rows
field.description: Number of rows to show.

field.name: pages
field.label: Pages
field.description: Number of pages to show. Transition effects are enabled between page changes.

field.name: offset
field.label: Offset
field.description: Number of results to skip

field.name: transmode
field.label: Display Style
field.description: Transition effect mode.

field.name: width
field.label: Window Width
field.description: Window width in pixels (only for Window mode).

field.name: height
field.label: Window Height
field.description: Window height in pixels (only for Window mode).

field.name: transpause
field.label: Transition pause
field.description: Pause time between transitions (in milliseconds, default: 4000).

field.name: transspeed
field.label: Transition duration
field.description: Transition duration in milliseconds (default: 1500).

field.name: transflow
field.label: Slide orientation
field.description: Starting transition orientation.

field.name: transtype
field.label: Transition type
field.description: Transition animation type.

field.name: button
field.label: Button Style
field.description: Button graphic set to use (if enabled).

field.name: template
field.label: Template
field.description: Select an exisiting module template. If none used, the following fields will be used.

field.name: moduletemplate
field.label: Module HTML template
field.description: HTML/CSS code to display the entire module.

field.name: itemtemplate
field.label: 'Main' Item HTML template
field.description: HTML/CSS code to display each member. You can embedd any of the supported tags to display article information.

field.name: iconType
field.label: Icon Type
field.description: Select Social Icon type.

field.name: iconSize
field.label: Icon Size
field.description: Set icon size. Use any valid CSS declaration size such as '20px', '2em', '20%' etc).

field.name: moretemplate
field.label: 'More' Item HTML template
field.description: HTML/CSS code to display each article. You can embedd any of the supported tags to display article information.

field.name: moreqty
field.label: More items
field.description: Enter how many elements to show in 'more area'.

field.name: moreclone
field.label: Clone from main?
field.description: Enabling this will make the articles in the more section be the same as in the main section.

field.name: morecols
field.label: More Columns
field.description: Number of articles to show horizontally. If number of articles is higher, multiple rows will be shown.

field.name: moretext
field.label: More legend
field.description: Legend to show in read more area.

field.name: morergb
field.label: More legend color
field.description: Legend color.

field.name: moreiconType
field.label: Icon Type
field.description: Select Social Icon type.

field.name: moreiconSize
field.label: Icon Size
field.description: Set icon size. Use any valid CSS declaration size such as '20px', '2em', '20%' etc).

field.name: translayer
field.label: Z layer
field.description: Define the z-index layer to use for the effects.

field.name: css
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: Optional CSS code to include.

field.name: nptipoi
field.label: In Opacity
field.description: Tooltip / Popup In Opacity Value.

field.name: nptipoo
field.label: Out Opacity
field.description: Tooltip / Popup Out Opacity Value.

field.name: nptipvi
field.label: In Animation Vertical
field.description: Height of Vertical In Animation.

field.name: nptipvo
field.label: Out Animation Vertical
field.description: Height of Vertical Out Animation.

field.name: nptiphi
field.label: In Animation Horizontal
field.description: Width of Tooltip / Popup In Animation.

field.name: nptipho
field.label: Out Animation Horizontal
field.description: Width of Tooltip Out / Popup Animation.

field.name: nptipdi
field.label: Fade-In Duration
field.description: Tooltip / Popup Animation Fade In Duration.

field.name: nptipdo
field.label: Fade-Out Duration
field.description: Tooltip / Popup Animation Fade Out Duration.

field.name: nptpause
field.label: Pause
field.description: Tooltip Pause Value (in millisencods).

field.name: nptipAnim
field.label: Tooltip animation mode
field.description: Tooltip / Popup animation mode.
field.option: Makes the transition go back, then forward

field.name: nptipEase
field.label: Tooltip / Popup ease mode
field.description: Tooltip ease mode.

field.name: nptipCenter
field.label: Centered Popup
field.description: Centers the pop-up window on the screen.

field.name: npslideitfx
field.label: Sliding Panel Settings
field.description: Sliding Panel

field.name: npslixin
field.label: Slide Panel X In
field.description: Slide X coordiantes px

field.name: npslixout
field.label: Slide Panel X out
field.description: Slide X coordiantes px

field.name: npsliyin
field.label: Slide Panel Y In
field.description: Slide Y coordiantes px

field.name: npsliyout
field.label: Slide Panel Y Out
field.description: Slide Y coordiantes px

field.name: npsliAnim
field.label: Slide animation mode
field.description: Slide Panel animation mode.
field.option: Makes the transition go back, then all forth

field.name: npsliEase
field.label: Slide ease mode
field.description: Slide ease mode.

field.name: npslidi
field.label: Frames Per Second
field.description: Frames per second

field.name: npslido
field.label: Frame Duration
field.description: Duration in Milliseconds.

field.name: hoifx
field.label: Hover Effect In Color
field.description: Hover Effect Color

field.name: hoofx
field.label: Hover Effect Out Color
field.description: Original Background Color

field.name: onclick
field.label: Refresh on click
field.description: Refresh wall contents on mouse click.
